summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of Sam (Samantha from Her 2013) application completed successfully. All core features working including chat functionality, orb animations, navigation, and admin portal with all 4 tabs functional.
passed_tests: Main page loads with dark background (#090505)
Pink animated orb visible and interactive with state changes
Navbar with Sam logo + Chat/Garden/Admin links functional
WebSocket live indicator working (shows connecting status)
Auto-greeting fires after 1500ms with Sam's first message
Chat input accepts text and responds to Enter key
Typing indicator (3 dots) appears during Sam's thinking
Sam responds with appropriate conversational messages
Voice toggle button (microphone) and TTS toggle present
Hold Space hint visible below input
Memory Garden page loads with canvas element and empty state
Admin Portal loads with all 4 tabs (Overview/Voice/Memory/Soul)
Admin Overview: All 6 stat cards visible (Messages/Memories/Sessions/Reflections/Proactive/Status)
Admin Voice: Shows 21 ElevenLabs voices with Preview Sam button
Admin Memory: Weekly Reflections and Memory Bank sections visible
Admin Soul: Sam's personality traits and Humanity Guardrails displayed
Plan selector (Basic/Pro/Operator) fully interactive with visual feedback
All 4 quick action buttons present and clickable
Navigation between all pages works correctly
Orb states change appropriately (idle/thinking/speaking)
Message timestamps and conversation flow working
